Data Analytics and Visualization

RE 519, Runstad Department of Real Estate, University of Washington, Autumn 2025
Monday & Wednesday, 2:30 - 3:50pm, Mechanical Engineering Building 245
Haoyu Yue (Pre-doctoral Instructor), yohaoyu@washington.edu, Schedule Office Hours

Home Syllabus Projects Resources Canvas Ed Discussion

Resources

Reference Text

  • Real Estate Analysis in the Information Age: Techniques for Big Data and Statistical Modeling - by Kimberly Winson-Geideman, Andy Krause, Clifford A. Lipscomb, Nick Evangelopoulos (2018).
  • Visualize This: The FlowingData Guide to Design, Visualization, and Statistics - by Nathan Yau (2024)
  • Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction - by Kieran Healy (2019)
  • Modern Data Science with R - by Benjamin S. Baumer, Daniel T. Kaplan, and Nicholas J. Horton (2024)
  • Posit Cheatsheets for R
    • RStudio IDE
    • rmarkdown
    • Data import with the tidyverse
    • Data transformation with dplyr
    • Data tidying with tidyr
    • Data visualization with ggplot2
    • Shiny

Tools and Softwares

  • Tidyverse (R) - a collection of R packages designed for data science
  • ggplot2 (R) - a graphics language for R
  • Shiny (R) - R package to create interactive web applications
  • Pandas (Python) - a package data for manipulation and analysis in Python
  • Matplotlib (Python) - free library for visualizations in Python
  • Vega-Altair (Python) - Jupyter-friendly Python API for Vega-Lite
  • Seaborn (Python) - a package for statistical data visualization, built on top of matplotlib
  • Tableau for Students – a free Tableau license for students
  • Tableau Public – a free platform to explore, create, share data visualizations, and connect with data analysts worldwide.
  • Adobe Color - free color palette generator
  • Viz Palette - picking colors for data visualizations
  • Visual Studio Code - a popular integrated development environment (IDE) and code editor
  • Anaconda - platform for data science, simplifying the development and deployment of projects
  • Windows Terminal - command-line shells for Windows
  • GitHub - a developer platform to create, store, manage, and share code

Datasets

Please filter the tags you’d like to use and review the details of each dataset. Let me know if you notice any issues.

  • Assessor History - By ATTOM (UW login required) [assessment, real estate, dewey platform, attom]
  • Automated Valuation Model (AVM) Data - By ATTOM (UW login required) [avm, real estate, dewey platform, attom, prices]
  • Census Bureau - American Community Survey [federal, census, housing, demographics, economic, community]
  • Census Bureau - Housing Datasets [federal, census, housing]
  • Community Information Layout - By ATTOM (UW login required) [community, demographics, real estate, dewey platform, attom]
  • Data Center of Redfin [private, housing, prices, redfin, portal]
  • Dewey Data Platform (UW login required) [portal, uw, urban, real estate, dewey platform]
  • Energy Star Certified Buildings and Plants [energy, buildings, federal]
  • FHFA House Price Index [federal, housing, prices, fhfa]
  • Federal Housing Datasets [federal, housing, finance, portal]
  • HUD (US Housing & Urban Development) Open Data / GIS [federal, hud, gis, housing, portal]
  • HUD (US Housing & Urban Development) User Datasets [federal, hud, housing, portal]
  • Historical Housing Prices Project - FRB Philadelphia [housing, prices, federal, historical data]
  • Housing Data Collection - FRB St. Louis [federal, housing, finance, prices]
  • Housing Data from Zillow [portal, housing, prices, zillow, avm]
  • Inside Airbnb Data [airbnb, short-term rental, housing]
  • King County Assessments Data [king county, assessment]
  • King County GIS Open Data [king county, gis, portal]
  • King County Residential Sales and Properties [king county, housing, sales]
  • National Housing Preservation Database (NHPD) [housing, federal, rental, ngo]
  • Pre-Foreclosure History - By ATTOM (UW login required) [foreclosure, real estate, dewey platform, attom]
  • Puget Sound Regional Council Data Portal [puget sound, planning, housing, portal]
  • Real Estate Listings for Commercial Properties - By REsimplifi (UW login required) [commercial, listings, real estate, dewey platform]
  • Seattle Open Data Portal [seattle, housing, portal]
  • United States Building Permits - By Builty (UW login required) [permits, construction, real estate, dewey platform]
  • United States Residential Rental Data - By RentHub (UW login required) [rental, housing, market, dewey platform]
  • Urban Institute Data Catalog [housing, urban, ngo]
  • Washington Center for Real Estate Research [washington, uw, housing, prices]
  • Washington State Geospatial Open Data Portal [washington, gis, portal]
